name: Harney & Sons Mango Tea, Black Loose Leaf Tea, 16 oz bag
short_description: Add a taste of the tropics to your morning routine.
A beautifully tropical blend rich and silky in texture that's perfect for chilly mornings and warm evenings alike.
Enjoy hot with a touch of sweetener, if you like, or pour over ice for a refreshing summertime brew.
This refreshingly fruity brew features a base of hearty, full-bodied black tea blended with fresh flavors of mango and mango pieces.
HARNEY & SONS IS A PROUD MEMBER OF 1% FOR THE PLANET. Joining 1% for The Planet meant we could directly donate one percent of our total sales to the environmental organizations of our choice.
product_description: Add a taste of the tropics to your morning routine. This refreshingly fruity brew features a base of hearty, full-bodied black tea blended with fresh flavors of mango and mango pieces. The result is a beautifully tropical Blend rich and silky in texture that's perfect for chilly mornings and warm evenings alike. Enjoy hot with a touch of sweetener, if you like, or pour over ice for a refreshing summertime brew.

name: Ahmad Tea Black Tea, Cardamom Loose Leaf, 454g - Caffeinated & Sugar-Free
short_description: DELICIOUS & SATISFYING FLAVOR – Ahmad Tea earned 22 Great Taste Awards, Cardamon being a worldwide best-selling black teas. Fresh cardamom flavor that complements the black teas with its warm aromatic spiciness.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Committing to quality and consistency, Ahmad Tea blends only the finest leaves cultivated from our trusted growers and tea gardens around the world.
BREWING YOUR TEA – Cardamon is offered in loose leaf, tagged teabags, and foiled envelope teabags. Steep according to the recommended time on the pack. Perfect for serving hot with a splash of milk.

TEA BENEFITS – Strong antioxidant properties that help support heart health and boosts your immune system. Cardamon tea is naturally caffeinated, sugar-free and a great substitute for coffee and soft drinks.
ETHICAL TEA PRACTICES – We are proud to support the Ethical Tea Partnership, who are working towards the lives of tea workers and their environment worldwide.
product_description: Our Cardamon tea is a uniquely flavored, exotic brew that fans of our Earl Grey or Chai Spice will love. Cardamon is our best-selling tea worldwide. For this blend, our Tea Masters create a black tea blend featuring lots of quality Kenyan leaves. This gives the brew its crisp and exotic aroma. Ahmad Tea was built upon the quality of teas that it produces and has accepted 22 Great Taste Awards. Ingredients - Black tea flavored with delicious Cardamon. Naturally caffeinated & sugar free. Origin - Sir Lanka, Malawi, Kenya *Subject to change due to seasonal variations. Brew Time - Infuse for 5-7minutes. Sip as is or add a splash of milk if so desired.

name: Ahmad Tea Black Tea, Ceylon Opa Loose Leaf, 454g - Caffeinated & Sugar-Free
short_description: DELICIOUS & SATISFYING FLAVOR – Ahmad Tea earned 22 Great Taste Awards, Ceylon being one of our most popular teas. A beautiful rich amber hue with fresh and zesty aromas.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Committing to quality and consistency, Ahmad Tea blends only the finest leaves cultivated from our trusted growers and tea gardens around the world.
BREWING YOUR TEA – Ceylon tea is offered in loose leaf and tagged tea bags. Steep according to the recommended time on the pack. Pairs well with milk or lemon and fruity cakes and pastries.

TEA BENEFITS – Strong antioxidant properties that help support heart health and boosts your immune system. Ceylon tea is naturally caffeinated, sugar-free, and a great substitute for coffee and soft drinks.
ETHICAL TEA PRACTICES – We are proud to support the Ethical Tea Partnership, who are working towards the lives of tea workers and their environment worldwide.
product_description: Our Ceylon is a fine example of one of the world's most popular teas. Well balanced, with a brisk and lively flavor, it makes an energizing cup of tea. Ceylon tea is a fine blend of high-altitude teas from the far away hillsides of Sir Lanka. Our Ceylon also make an excellent iced tea, steeped with lemon and sugar. Ahmad Tea was built upon the quality of teas that it produces and has accepted 22 Great Taste Awards. Ingredients - Black tea. Fresh aroma and zesty flavors. Naturally caffeinated & sugar free. Origin - Sir Lanka *Subject to change due to seasonal variations. Brew Time - Infuse for 3-5 minutes. Sip as is or add milk or a slice of lemon if so desired. Taste great with fruity cakes and pastries.

name: Tiesta Tea - Chai Love | Loose Leaf | Spiced Chai Black Tea | Premium Blend | High Caffeinated Black | Make Hot or Iced Brews Up to 25 Cups | 1.9 Ounce Resealable Pouch
short_description: SPICED CHAI BLACK TEA: Our Spiced Chai Black Tea is a masterpiece that beautifully marries aromatic spices with robust black tea. The result is a captivatingly rich and complex flavor experience that will transport you to the heart of traditional chai preparation, infused with love and tradition. Enjoy it hot or refreshingly iced, and relish the essence of summer with every sip.

PREMIUM LOOSE LEAF TEA BLEND: Elevate your tea ritual with our meticulously crafted premium loose leaf blend. We've sourced the finest natural ingredients, including Black tea, ginger, cardamom, cloves, and pink peppercorns, to awaken your senses. As you bid farewell to disposable tea bags, you'll embrace the opulent richness that's visible in the vibrant tea leaves, aromatic in its scent.

REUSABLE TEA POUCH FOR TEA LOVERS: Our charming and reusable pouch is the ideal present for tea enthusiasts. Offering airtight storage, it ensures that your chai loose leaf tea remains cozy and fresh for 20-25 cups. Not only a functional addition to your tea collection, but it also sits beautifully on your countertop, a testament to your passion for fine teas.

EFFORTLESS BREWING: Enjoy an easy brewing experience with our chai loose leaf tea. Simply scoop 1.5 tsp of this delightful loose leaf tea blend for every 8 oz of hot water at 195 degrees Fahrenheit. Allow it to steep for 3-5 minutes to release the full spectrum of flavors. Then, savor the moment as you remove the tea leaves and indulge in your perfectly steeped cup.

SEASONAL FLAVORS: Tiesta Tea’s loose-leaf blends are crafted to enhance your tea experience throughout the colder months. These seasonal favorites deliver a variety of flavors that are easy to brew and enjoy. Whether for personal use or shared during holiday gatherings, Tiesta Tea includes options that match different preferences and occasions.

name: FullChea - Golden Monkey Tea - Chinese Black Tea Loose Leaf with Gold Tips - Health Tea (8.8oz / 250g)
short_description: Superb Taste and Aroma: This Golden Monkey loose leaf black tea has a brilliant caramel color tea soup, fruity taste, mild, sweet, apricot smelling dry tea. Dark honey brown liquor with a more earthy scent and light floral notes, with hints of dried fruit
Tea Gifts: In Chinese culture, tea represents elegance, health and thanksgiving, so this black tea loose leaf is a warm gift for your lovers, and family members

Pure Hand-picked Black Tea: Golden Monkey Tea takes only the wild species tea bud tip grown at the top of the mountain as the raw material. It is made by using Lapsang Souchong's traditional craftsmanship and innovative technology
100% Fresh: To make sure it is natural, without any additives, promise to offer you Chinese tea at its best status, we only selected the top bud - the sweetest and most prized part of the tea leaf

Repeated Infusions: In a dry form - tea sheet with a characteristic aroma is made into dry tea. At brewing the tea leaf is extended out completely, without changing colors, and can be brew more than 3 infusions

name: Tiesta Tea - Passion Berry Jolt, Loose Leaf, Raspberry Passion Fruit Black Tea, Premium Caffeinated Blend, Make Hot or Iced & Brews Up to 50 Cups, 4oz Refillable Tin
short_description: RASPBERRY PASSION FRUIT BLACK TEA: Our loose leaf Raspberry Passion Fruit Black Tea is a vibrant fusion of energizing black tea and the tantalizing flavor of fruit. This delightful combination is a wakeup call for your taste buds. Enjoy it hot or refreshingly iced, and relish the essence of summer with every sip.

PREMIUM LOOSE LEAF TEA BLEND: Made with high-quality black tea, cornflowers, and rich flavors, our loose leaf blend delivers a fresher, more flavorful experience than tea bags. Crafted with the finest ingredients, each sip provides an aromatic infusion with a smooth balance of fruit and tea to awaken your senses

REUSABLE TEA TIN FOR TEA LOVERS: Our charming and reusable tin is the perfect present for tea enthusiasts. Offering airtight storage, it ensures that your loose leaf black tea remains fresh and flavorful for 40-50 cups. Whether you're a seasoned tea drinker or new to loose-leaf blends, this tea fits seamlessly into your daily routine. Enjoy it as a morning energizer, a mid-day refresher, or a flavorful treat to wind down in the evening.

EFFORTLESS BREWING: Simplify your brewing with our loose leaf black tea blend. Just scoop 1.5 tsp per 8 oz of hot water at 195°F and steep for 3-5 minutes. Then, savor the moment as you remove the tea leaves and indulge in the rich and aromatic notes of our premium blend. Steep longer for a stronger brew or less for a lighter taste. Make a concentrated batch for lattes or iced tea to suit your preference

SEASONAL FLAVORS: Tiesta Tea’s loose-leaf blends are crafted to enhance your tea experience throughout the colder months. These seasonal favorites deliver a variety of flavors that are easy to brew and enjoy. Whether for personal use or shared during holiday gatherings, Tiesta Tea includes options that match different preferences and occasions.

name: Yorkshire Tea, Red, Black Tea, Loose Leaf, 8.8 Ounces, Refreshing, Satisfying, and Strong, Classic British Breakfast Blend, Caffeinated, Enjoy Hot or Iced
short_description: Rich, full-bodied blend makes an ideal breakfast tea or afternoon delight.
Ingredients: Black tea.
For the perfect cup measure 1 tsp of loose leaf tea. Pour 7-9 oz of freshly boiled water over the tea leaves and infuse for 4-5 minutes. Serve with milk or lemon.
One 8.8 ounce bag of loose tea.
Taylors of Harrogate is Carbon Neutral Certified, a member of the Ethical Tea Partnership, and Rainforest Alliance Certified.
product_description: Product Description A proper brew – pure and simple. We buy teas from the top tea gardens and estates in East Africa and Asia, putting the best quality into our tea bags so that you get the best flavour out. From the Manufacturer The best tea for your teapot. If you enjoy your tea made properly in a teapot, you'll really appreciate the lovely rich taste of Yorkshire tea. Our tea tasters sample hundreds of teas every week to find the one that give Yorkshire tea its rich, satisfying taste, and we are happy to pay that little bit extra for the pick of the crop. We also take the time and trouble to blend our tea so suit your water, whether it's hard or soft.
